Uses of Interface
com.joliciel.talismane.filters.Sentence

  • Packages that use Sentence 
    Package Description
    com.joliciel.talismane.filters
    Package managing the initial filtering of an input stream, such as in the case of XML analysis, where the XML tags need to be removed, and in some case represent sentence breaks.
    com.joliciel.talismane.output
    Classes and templates for producing Talismane's output in CoNLL-X and related formats.
    com.joliciel.talismane.parser
    Transition-based dependency parsing (Parser), evaluation (ParserEvaluator), and output artefacts (ParseConfiguration, DependencyNode).
    com.joliciel.talismane.sentenceDetector
    Training and evaluation for sentence detectors.
    com.joliciel.talismane.tokeniser
    Tokenisation package.

      Methods in com.joliciel.talismane.tokeniser that return Sentence 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Sentence TokenSequence.getSentence()
      The sentence object on which this token sequence was built, allowing us to identify its location in the source text.
      Sentence TokenisedAtomicTokenSequence.getSentence()
      The original sentence.
      Methods in com.joliciel.talismane.tokeniser with parameters of type Sentence 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      TokenisedAtomicTokenSequence TokeniserService.getTokenisedAtomicTokenSequence(Sentence sentence, int initialCapacity) 
      TokenSequence TokeniserService.getTokenSequence(Sentence sentence)
      Create a token sequence for a given sentence.
      TokenSequence TokeniserService.getTokenSequence(Sentence sentence, Pattern separatorPattern)
      Create a token sequence from a given sentence, pre-separated into tokens matching the separatorPattern.
      TokenSequence TokeniserService.getTokenSequence(Sentence sentence, Pattern separatorPattern, Set<TokenPlaceholder> placeholders)
      Create a token sequence from a given sentence, pre-separated into tokens matching the separatorPattern, except for the placeholders provided.
      List<TokenSequence> Tokeniser.tokenise(Sentence sentence)
      Similar to Tokeniser.tokeniseWithDecisions(Sentence), but returns the token sequences inferred from the decisions, rather than the list of decisions themselves.
      List<TokenisedAtomicTokenSequence> Tokeniser.tokeniseWithDecisions(Sentence sentence)
      Similar to Tokeniser.tokeniseWithDecisions(String), but the text to be tokenised is contained within a Sentence object.
